body_html:
For example, I cannot take tf.gradients() on a gradient node to compute second order derivatives.
y = sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits=z, labels=y_)
grad_z = tf.gradients(y, z)
grad_grad_z = tf.gradients(y, grad_z) # This returns [None], thus no second order derivative can be taken.
body_text:
For example, I cannot take tf.gradients() on a gradient node to compute second order derivatives.
y = sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits=z, labels=y_)
grad_z = tf.gradients(y, z)
grad_grad_z = tf.gradients(y, grad_z) # This returns [None], thus no second order derivative can be taken.
body:
For example, I cannot take tf.gradients() on a gradient node to compute second order derivatives. 
y = sparse_softmax_cross_entropy_with_logits(logits=z, labels=y_)
grad_z = tf.gradients(y, z)
grad_grad_z = tf.gradients(y, grad_z) # This returns [None], thus no second order derivative can be taken.
